com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.utils

Interface RayConfiguration<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of vector, either 2D or 3D, implementing the Vector interface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CentralRayWithWhiskersConfiguration, ParallelSideRayConfiguration, RayConfigurationBase, SingleRayConfiguration

    public interface RayConfiguration<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>
    A RayConfiguration is a collection of rays typically used for collision avoidance.
